required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Impact of Oligo-Fucoidan in Cancer Cachexia and Sarcopenia
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Trial for Oligo-Fucoidan in Cancer Cachexia and Sarcopenia

brief_summary.textblock: Fucoidan also ameliorates tumour and chemotherapy-induced muscle atrophy and -related cachectic symptoms in vivo and in vitro. To evaluate the effect of fucoidan in cancer cachexia or sarcopenia in cancer patients.

detailed_description.textblock: Cancer cachexia is characterized by anorexia, skeletal muscle atrophy, and systemic inflammation. Fucoidan extracted from brown algae exhibits anti-inflammatory and anticancer activities. In addition, fucoidan also ameliorates tumour and chemotherapy-induced muscle atrophy and -related cachectic symptoms in vivo and in vitro. To evaluate the effect of fucoidan in cancer cachexia or sarcopenia in cancer patients.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Study Type : Interventional (Clinical Trial) Actual Enrollment : 100 participants Allocation: Randomized Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, matching sex, age, and performance status

primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 day, 60th day, and 90th day Body weight change

secondary_outcome.description: Lean body mass measured by DEXA. Percentage of change day 90, 60-baseline. (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: Muscle Strength as Measured by Grip Strength.
secondary_outcome.description: Dominant hand grip strength day 90, 60 - percent change from baseline (%)

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life as assessed using the FACIT-F Patient Reported Outcome assessments
secondary_outcome.description: Quality of life as assessed using the FACIT-F Patient Reported Outcome assessments - percentage of change day 90, 60-baseline (with a range from 0 to 52)
Appetite measured by a visual analogue scale ASAS. Percentage of change day 90, 60-baseline (providing a range of scores from 0-100)
Functional performance using stair-climbing power day 90, 60 percent change from baseline (continuous variable ) Power = Work/time Power = (acceleration due to gravity) x mass x distance/time
leg extension - percentage of change day 90, 60 to baseline (%)
change between day 90, 60 and baseline (continuous variable, t-test)

secondary_outcome.measure: Biomarkers TNF-alpha, IL-6, IGF-1 and IGFBP-3.
secondary_outcome.description: change between day 90, 60 and baseline(continuous variable, t-test)

arm_group.description: It is recommended to consume on an empty stomach, 2 servings per day, a total of 8 tablets, which can be eaten at one time or in divided doses. If it is difficult to swallow, the powder in the capsule can also be taken out and mixed with food or liquid food.

intervention.description: It is recommended to consume on an empty stomach, 2 servings per day, a total of 8 tablets, which can be eaten at one time or in divided doses. If it is difficult to swallow, the powder in the capsule can also be taken out and mixed with food or liquid food.

patient_data.ipd_time_frame: data will become available on April 30 2022.
